Class JscienceServer

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.proto.ComputeServiceGrpc.ComputeServiceImplBase
org.jscience.server.JscienceServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.grpc.BindableService, ComputeServiceGrpc.AsyncService
public class JscienceServer extends ComputeServiceGrpc.ComputeServiceImplBase
Coordinator Server for Distributed JScience Computing. Receives tasks via gRPC and executes them (mimicking a cluster).
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
